ng-new.description: Creates a new project by combining the workspace and application schematics.

project.description: Generates a new basic application definition in the "projects" subfolder of the workspace.

module.description: Creates a new, generic NgModule definition in the given or default project.

component.description: Creates a new, generic component definition in the given or default project.

directive.description: Creates a new, generic directive definition in the given or default project.

pipe.description: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

service.description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

class.description: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given or default project.

interface.description: Creates a new, generic interface definition in the given or default project.

enum.description: Creates a new, generic enum definition in the given or default project.

validator.description: Creates a new sync or async validator in the given or default project.

guard.description: Creates a new, generic route guard definition in the given or default project.

interceptor.description: Creates a new, generic route interceptor definition in the given or default project.

resolver.description: Creates a new, generic resolver definition in the given or default project.

feature-group.description: Creates a new feature group in the given or default project.
